title: quinn
body: why does quinn have 525 auto atttack range instead of 550?

replies.body: Because top lane melee champ players would raise a bitch fest of unprecedented scale if Quinn were to have longer range.
Because she is meant to be a tag team (RIP) spell weaver/burst assassin. Giving her longer range would make her too strong. On the flip side, due to her low range, she had/has the blind/nearsight
